title: Victoria's Favourite Things. Segment 1
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Social life and customs
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Interactive media
abstract: Mallee roots, 19th century books, a wife, Spy Kids, retirement and Oscar!
description: The results of July 2004's Open House weekend program 'Victoria's Favourite Things'. This segment features Norma from Swan Hill talking about a Mallee root; Alex from Melbourne discusses 19th century literature; Adam Elliott is still thrilled by his Oscar; Lewis loves the Spy Kids movies; Alfred of Reservoir tells us that retirement is his favourite thing and a visitor from Hong Kong bursts into song!
